column4: hello, I installed ubunut6.06 server and after installing lighttpd, when i try to reload it I get: /etc/lighttpd/lighttpd.conf line: 162 pos: 15 parser failed somehow near here: (EOL) [fail]
I also installed the exact same packages on a second machine, and that one reloads just fine
you might try looking at line 162 in that file and see if anything looks funny.
